scripts.test:javascripting: for file in javascripting/*; do node "$file"; done
scripts.test:learnyounode: node learnyounode/hello-world.js && node learnyounode/baby-steps.js 1 2 3 && node learnyounode/my-first-io.js ./package.json && node learnyounode/my-first-async-io.js ./package.json
scripts.test: npm run test:javascripting -s && npm run test:learnyounode -s
